<template>
  <ListView />
  <AddCategory />
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from "vuex";
import AddCategory from "@/components/AddCategory.vue";
import ListView from "@/components/ListView.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    AddCategory,
    ListView,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters("cate", ["allcate"]),
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      post: [],
      menu: false,
      model: {
        title: "",
        description: "",
      },
    };
  },

  async mounted() {
    let res = await axios.get("http://localhost:8081/wp-json/wp/v2/posts", {
      headers: {
        Authorization:
          "Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwOi8vbG9jYWxob3N0OjgwODEiLCJpYXQiOjE3Mzc1NDIxMjQsIm5iZiI6MTczNzU0MjEyNCwiZXhwIjoxNzM3NTQyNzI0LCJkYXRhIjp7InVzZXIiOnsiaWQiOjEsImRldmljZSI6IiIsInBhc3MiOiIzYWJjZmRiYzNiYjVhNjg1YmZlYzc5NDM0ZjdkNjVmOSJ9fX0.SqIspUKjLQ36LQs56nSjItyOBBLQ_xIMn0o1VeRqOo0",
      },
    });
    this.post = res.data;
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions("cate", ["getCat"]),
    async deleteCat(id) {
      alert(id);
      /*await axios
        .delete(
          "http://localhost:8081/wp-json/wp/v2/categories/" +
            id +
            "?force=true",
          {
            headers: {
              Authorization:
                "Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwOi8vbG9jYWxob3N0OjgwODEiLCJpYXQiOjE3Mzc1NTAzMjMsIm5iZiI6MTczNzU1MDMyMywiZXhwIjoxNzM3NTUwOTIzLCJkYXRhIjp7InVzZXIiOnsiaWQiOjEsImRldmljZSI6IiIsInBhc3MiOiIzYWJjZmRiYzNiYjVhNjg1YmZlYzc5NDM0ZjdkNjVmOSJ9fX0.9QP0hJH01gL2nkUo34MgP4XBx1bLW5THGuYRo2wfbwg",
            },
          }
        )
        .then((res) => {
          console.log(res.data);
          this.$store.dispatch("cate/getCat");
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.log(error);
        });*/
    },
    startDrag(evt, post) {
      evt.dataTransfer.dropEffect = "move";
      evt.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = "move";
      evt.dataTransfer.setData("itemID", post.id);
    },
    onDrop(evt, list) {
      console.log("ok");
      const postID = evt.dataTransfer.getData("itemID");
      const post = this.posts.value.find((post) => post.id == postID);
      post.list = list;
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.$store.dispatch("cate/getCat");
  },
};
</script>
